body_html:
@lukeiwanski these massive PRs are hard to review since there is a stream of new commits being added, and the PR is already very large.

We typically try to stage these changes in small PRs that are more easily reviewable -- can you break this change into smaller requests in some way? As it is, I don't see anybody being able to safely review a change of this magnitude (117 files!)

body:
@lukeiwanski these massive PRs are hard to review since there is a stream of new commits being added, and the PR is already very large.

We typically try to stage these changes in small PRs that are more easily reviewable -- can you break this change into smaller requests in some way?  As it is, I don't see anybody being able to safely review a change of this magnitude (117 files!)
